casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Deborah A. PATTERSON, BY Eric T. PATTERSON, Personal Representative, and Estate of Mary K. Massengill, by Claude Massengill, Jr., Personal Representative, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159359
COA: 342514 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 10, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the February 28, 2019 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
